apiInfo.title: Formation Management API
apiInfo.description: Complete API documentation for the Formation (Training) Management System

routes.description: Obtenir les statistiques des formations - Returns complete statistics on formations, participants, certifications, etc.
Obtenir la liste des formations - Returns all available formations in the system
Obtenir la liste paginée des formations - Returns a paginated page of formations with sorting
Obtenir une formation par ID - Returns details of a specific formation
Créer une nouvelle formation - Adds a new formation with its information and relations
Mettre à jour une formation - Modifies information of an existing formation
Supprimer une formation - Deletes an existing formation from database
Dupliquer une formation - Creates a complete copy of a formation with all its global objectives, specific objectives, and detailed contents
Lier un objectif global à une formation - Links a global objective to a formation
Délier un objectif global d'une formation - Unlinks a global objective from a formation
Lier un objectif spécifique à une formation - Links a specific objective to a formation
Délier un objectif spécifique d'une formation - Unlinks a specific objective from a formation
Obtenir la liste des plans de formation - Returns complete list of training plans
Obtenir un plan de formation par ID - Returns details of a specific training plan
Créer un plan de formation - Adds a new training plan with its information
Mettre à jour un plan de formation - Modifies information of an existing plan
Supprimer un plan de formation - Deletes a training plan from database
Obtenir les plans d'une formation spécifique - Returns all plans linked to a given formation
Get global objectives by formation ID
Get global objectives not linked to a formation
Search global objectives not linked to formation by description
Get specific objectives by global content ID
Copy and link a specific objective
Get global contents by formation ID
Get daily contents by specific objective ID
Assign detailed contents to daily content
Get assigned detailed contents for daily content

endpoints.description: Detailed content management with file uploads

routes.description: Get detailed contents by daily content ID
Get detailed contents by formation ID
Get detailed contents grouped by daily contents for a formation
Upload file for a specific content level
Get list of files for a content level
Create new trainer with photo upload
Get exams by training plan ID
Get learners by training plan ID
Get evaluations by daily content ID

endpoints.description: Large file upload with streaming support

notes.security: All formation endpoints are public and do not require authentication.
notes.cors: CORS is enabled for localhost:4200, localhost:8080, and platform.sms2i.com.tn
notes.fileUploads: File uploads are supported for trainers (photos) and detailed contents (documents/media)
notes.pagination: Several endpoints support pagination with page, size, sortBy, and sortDirection parameters
